===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[come]] [[out]] (from inside to outside, or to the speaker).
#: {{zh-x|從 房間 裏 出來|to '''come out''' of the room}}
# (after a verb) [[out]] (ditto)
#: {{zh-x|走 出來|to walk out}}
# to [[appear]]
#: {{zh-x|結果 出來 了。|The result came '''out'''.}}
# (after a verb) to make [[evident]]
#: {{zh-x|我 看 出來 怎麼 用 了。|I figured out (after observation) how to use it.}}
# (after a verb) to [[finish]] doing something; to [[accomplish]] something
#: {{zh-x|做 出來|to work it out}}

====Usage notes====
* Potential forms include {{zh-l|出[[得]]來/出[[得]]来|chūdelái|can come out, can appear}} and {{zh-l|出[[不]]來/出[[不]]来|chūbùlái|have no way to come out, can not appear}}. When it is used after a verb, however, it is {{zh-l|[[得]]出來/[[得]]出来|de chūlái}}, {{zh-l|[[不]]出來/[[不]]出来|bù chūlái}}.
* When it is used after a verb, it is also possible to insert a noun (or a phrase playing the role of a noun) between the two charaters, for example, {{zh-l|[[拿]]出[[錢]]來/[[拿]]出[[钱]]来|náchū qián lái|to take out money}}, {{zh-l|[[拿]]得出[[錢]]來/[[拿]]得出[[钱]]来|nádechū qián lái|to be able to provide out money}}.
